languages.text: Вас окружают несколько пиратских кораблей, и вы точно знаете, чего они хотят — отомстить за кражу их собственности и покарать убийцу Пустотелого Виктора.

traits.locale_text: Вас окружают несколько пиратских кораблей, и вы точно знаете, чего они хотят — отомстить за кражу их собственности и покарать убийцу Пустотелого Виктора.

languages.text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.
languages.original_text: Вас окружают несколько пиратских кораблей, и вы точно знаете, чего они хотят — отомстить за кражу их собственности и покарать убийцу Пустотелого Виктора.

traits.locale_text: You're surrounded by several pirate ships, and you're sure you know what they're after: avenging the theft of their property and punishing Hollow-Body Victor's killer.
You're surrounded by several pirate ships, and you're sure you know what they're after: avenging the theft of their property and punishing Hollow-Body Victor's killer.
You're surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they're after — avenging the theft of their property and punishing Hollow-Body Victor's killer.
You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.
You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.
You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

languages.text: 你的舰船被几艘海盗船团团包围。你很确信你知道他们想要什么——他们打算惩罚那些夺走他们财宝的人，还打算为“空心”维克多报仇。
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

traits.locale_text: 你的舰船被几艘海盗船团团包围。你很确信你知道他们想要什么——他们打算惩罚那些夺走他们财宝的人，还打算为“空心”维克多报仇。

languages.text: Te rodean varias naves piratas y sabes lo que quieren: vengar el robo de su propiedad y la muerte de Víctor Corazón Hueco.
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

traits.locale_text: Te rodean varias naves piratas y sabes lo que quieren: vengar el robo de su propiedad y la muerte de Víctor Corazón Hueco.

languages.text: 数隻の海賊船に囲まれた。奴らの目的は当然わかっている。財産を盗まれたことへの仕返しと、ビクター・ザ・ホロウ・ハートを殺めた者への報復だ。
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

traits.locale_text: 数隻の海賊船に囲まれた。奴らの目的は当然わかっている。財産を盗まれたことへの仕返しと、ビクター・ザ・ホロウ・ハートを殺めた者への報復だ。

languages.text: Du wirst von mehreren Piratenschiffen umzingelt und bist dir sicher, dass du ganz genau weißt, was sie wollen: Den Diebstahl ihres Eigentums rächen und {mf|den Mörder|die Mörderin} von Victor Hohlherz bestrafen.
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

traits.locale_text: Du wirst von mehreren Piratenschiffen umzingelt und bist dir sicher, dass du ganz genau weißt, was sie wollen: Den Diebstahl ihres Eigentums rächen und {mf|den Mörder|die Mörderin} von Victor Hohlherz bestrafen.

languages.text: Plusieurs vaisseaux pirates vous encerclent et ce qu'ils veulent ne fait aucun doute : venger le vol de leur propriété et punir {mf|le|la} responsable de la mort de Victor le Cœur-creux.
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.

traits.locale_text: Plusieurs vaisseaux pirates vous encerclent et ce qu'ils veulent ne fait aucun doute : venger le vol de leur propriété et punir {mf|le|la} responsable de la mort de Victor le Cœur-creux.

languages.text: Birkaç korsan gemisi, geminin etrafını sarıyor. Ne istediklerini biliyorsun: Mallarının çalınmasının intikamını almak ve Yüreksiz Victor'ın katilini cezalandırmak.
languages.original_text: You are surrounded by several pirate ships, and you are certain you know what they want — to avenge the theft of their property and to punish the killer of Victor the Hollow Heart.
